com.djzass.medipoint.boundary_ui

Class FollowUpAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.widget.BaseAdapter
      • android.widget.ArrayAdapter<Appointment>
        • com.djzass.medipoint.boundary_ui.FollowUpAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.widget.Adapter, android.widget.Filterable, android.widget.ListAdapter, android.widget.SpinnerAdapter

    public class FollowUpAdapter
extends android.widget.ArrayAdapter<Appointment>
    Created by Deka on 12/4/2015. FollowUpAdapter is a custom adapter class for displaying appointment item in the list of recent appointments. This class extends from ArrayAdapter class and accepts Appointment objects. Each of the Appointment objects that use this adapter will be displayed as individual item in FollowUpListActivity.

    Each item in the follow up appointment list will include:

    • Specialty Icon
    • Appointment Service
    • Appointment Date
    • Appointment Time

    Since:
    2015
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Deka
    See Also:
    ArrayAdapter
